name: Secrets of the Cryptkeeper's Haunted House
original_name: Secrets of the Cryptkeeper's Haunted House
overview: Secrets of the Cryptkeeperâ€™s Haunted House is a Children's Saturday-morning game show that ran on CBS. It premiered on September 14, 1996 and lasted until August 23, 1997. It featured the Cryptkeeper of Tales from the Crypt now serving as an announcer. It is the last TV series in the Tales From the Crypt franchise.
